title: [GAMEPLAY] Shaco clone ignores player input after killing a plant.
body:
Server: EUW
Type of bug:   In-game champion Bug
Details:    When you make the shaco clone hit a plant, the clone moves alone to the real shaco, and before 2 seconds after the clone kills the plant, if you make the clone move to another location he tries to go there, but he quickly moves again to the real one ignoring your input.

Reproduction steps:
1-Use shaco ultimate skill (R)
2- Press Ctrl + Right click on a healing or vision plant ( to tell the clone to attack it)
Observed results: when the clone kills the plant, the clone starts moving towards your position
Expected results: Stand still?

3- when the clone starts moving to your position, and before 2 seconds, press Ctrl + Right click to any location to move the clone away.
Observed results: The clone starts moving to your desired location, and quickly turns to move towards the real shaco ignoring your input.
Expected results: The clone starts moving to your desired location, and it gets there.

Reproduction rate: 10/10
